import React, { Component } from "react"; import { fetchCart } from "../../JS/actions/product"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import axios from "axios"; class OrderSummary extends Component { componentDidMount() { const fetchData = async () => { try { await this.props.fetchCart(this.props.user.id); } catch (err) {} }; fetchData(); console.log(this.props.cart); } handleDelete = (id) => { this.props.DeleteItemFromCart }; render() { const { cart } = this.props; return (
{cart ? cart.order_items.map((item) => ( )) : null}
Product Price Quantity Total Item
{item.item.title}

{item.item.category}

 {item.item.price} {item.final_price} this.handleDelete(item.id)} > Delete

Total

{cart ? cart.total : null}

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ user: state.account.user, cart: state.product.cart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchCart })(OrderSummary);
